name: The ligth is were you are.
name_original: The ligth is were you are.
description:
For This Game i recommend playing with full screen!

as the tutorial is buggued this iare the controls

WASD or arrows to move

W/ Up Arrow/ Space to jump (Doble Jump)

Q- Main Menu 

R- Reset Level

the ligth is were you are is a simple 2d platformer with 6 levels, enemies jumpers and moving platforms!

the restriction that i had for myself was that i had to do everything, all the art, music, and sprites!

Hope you enjoy it!
